title: Taskbar not going away
body:
Trying to play the game, but my task bar keeps showing up and I can't get it to go away. Hiding it doesn't work. It has happened before, but prior to this patch, it usually went away once I clicked out and back in a few times. Anyone know how to fix it?

Update: My computer needed to update. Did that and it was fixed next time I tried playing.

replies.body: same problem here. Don't know how to fix after I tried repairing the client
My computer needed an update, so I did that and it works now.

Sorry that I wasn't able to get to your post before you fixed it, but hey good job getting it done!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I'll let you all know if any other issues pop up, but for now, we're good.
